Transmutate felt angry at the comment. The Maximals
had been victorious, they weren't even chasing their
enemies, but instead letting them flee, and for such a
deed why should they be attacked (whether this bot was
with the first bots or not). Suddenly a wave of anger
flows through mutate. Energon begins coming out of his
mouth in an unstable wave. He flies in a wild charge
up to the bot just as the energy is released only 2
feet from this bot.

OOC: Thanks Nemasis (did I spell it right) I've been
dieing to do that and don't complain because he did it
on the show whenever he got scared or angry. And it
might do some damage to Rampage, how far do you
estimate this bot was from Rampage?

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Just as Megatron orders the Decepticons to retreat,
> the mysterious robot from 
> the Infecticons arrives on the scene. He flys and
> hovers down onto the ground 
> a short distance from megatron, his arms crossed,
> his black, red, and grey 
> form gleaming in the sunlight. The field of energy
> that surrounds him then 
> dissapears and an intense shockwave is sent out from
> his body knocking large 
> boulders away from him.
> 
> ????: "So the decepticons have been defeated despite
> the Maximal base having 
> been incapacitated. This news is most unsettling,
> yet I can not help but feel 
> obligated to make sure the Maximals lose this day.
> It is now time to seperate 
> the weak from the strong here... the weak ones being
> the Maximals. 
> Decepticons, do not give up and combat the Maximals.
> Fight to your deaths if 
> neccesary!"
> 
> The bot just continued to stand there, bolts of
> energy gliding along the 
> smooth metallic plates of his armor.
>
